// Create an S3Client
$s3Client = new S3Client([
    'profile' => 'default',
    'region' => 'us-west-2',
    'version' => '2006-03-01'
]);


//Copy objects within S3
$copier = new MultipartCopy($s3Client, '/bucket/key?versionId=foo', [
    'bucket' => 'your-bucket',
    'key' => 'my-file.zip',
]);

try {
    $result = $copier->copy();
    echo "Copy complete: {$result['ObjectURL']}\n";
} catch (MultipartUploadException $e) {
    echo $e->getMessage() . "\n";
}
